sermons.title: (Dangers in the Way Series): Dangers of Bondage and Liberty
(Dangers in the Way Series): Dangers of Idleness and Busyness
(Dangers in the Way Series): Resisting the Worlds Propoganda
(Forging the Vessel of Recovery) 1- The Success of the First Century Church
(Forging the Vessel of Recovery) 5- A Vessel Of Glory
(Fury of Fire) 09 - Close to Being Cursed
(Godly Home) Part 24 - Godly men have radiant Wives
sermons.description: Denny Kenaston shares how the woman is the glory of the man; therefore the husband needs to take care of his "glow-ry".  A number of practical ways husbands can lay their lives down for their wives are things like praise and attention, quality time, unconditional love and acceptance.  These expressions of love are what contribute to a radiant wife who is the crown of her husband.

sermons.title: (South West Baptist Church 2008) Have You Let Go
(Women) 02. What fruit can be expected from a happy marriage (part1)
(Women) 03. What fruit can be expected from a happy marriage (part2)
01 Acknowledgements
sermons.description: Every New Testament Epistle is full of acknowledgments1 of believers who were in different cities and those who were laboring hard in the Lord. The names of those who have had a part in this volume are too numerous to mention. To all those who labored in editing, revising, suggesting and offering your counsel we are indebted. Above every human help we recognize the Lordâ€™s hand in this volume from the start to finish. The messages in this book were birthed out of a genuine burden2 of the Lord and we pray this burden has been conveyed with as little interference from the human vessels3 as possible.
sermons.speaker_name: Principles For The Gathering of Believers

sermons.title: 22 Principle 18 - The Satanic Counterfeit
sermons.description: Though God is always working in different ways and with different means, it is still only by the Spirit of God that the Church will grow. Over the past 50 years particularly originating in Western countries there have been such excesses and abuses of what is considered Spirit-filled Christianity that many true believers have been repulsed completely from even seeking the Lord for the true filling of the Spirit. This is not only a tragedy but one of Satanâ€™s tactics323 to hinder the growth of the true Church of Jesus Christ. The genuine believer should never feel scared to call out to God for fresh infusions of the Spirit of God for service324 and to foster a dependence on the Holy Spirit of God daily in his life.
sermons.speaker_name: Principles For The Gathering of Believers

sermons.title: 53 Principle 49 - Sharing and Memorization of Scripture
sermons.description: Psalm 119 is the longest chapter in Scripture and it is devoted to exclaiming the wonders of Godâ€™s Word and Law. It would be a worthy practice for us to read this chapter over and over to allow God to build in us an admiration and love for His Scriptures again. Would you forfeit all the riches you possess, to simply have in your possession a copy of Godâ€™s holy Word? The Psalmist might have for he proclaimed: â€œThe Law from Your mouth is more precious to me than thousands of pieces of silver and gold.â€ May we emulate our North Korean brothers and sisters by treating Godâ€™s Word as the most precious possession we have.
sermons.speaker_name: Principles For The Gathering of Believers

sermons.title: 64. What is required in the fifth commandment?
68. What is required in the sixth commandment?
72. What is forbidden in the seventh commandment?
Being Filled With The Holy Spirit
Christ's Love to His Spouse
sermons.description: With great reverence, let us think, first, of how Christ loves the church; then, secondly, how he has proved his love by giving himself for the church; and then, thirdly, let us make the practical enquiry, how shall we think of this wondrous love of Christ?

sermons.title: Desert Survival Series Pt 16- Moses The Servant of God
Destroying Pop-Christian Views of Marital Bliss - Part 1
sermons.description: This is not your typical wedding sermon that is forgotten as soon as it is preached... it is full of practical, biblical and powerful advice about marriage and God's purpose for it. This sermon is not just for those seeking marriage or those recently married, it will even benefit those who have been married for decades.

sermons.title: Destroying Pop-Christian Views of Marital Bliss - Part 2
sermons.description: This is not your typical wedding sermon that is forgotten as soon as it is preached... it is full of practical, biblical and powerful advice about marriage and God's purpose for it. This sermon is not just for those seeking marriage or those recently married, it will even benefit those who have been married for decades.

sermons.title: God's Desire Is For A Bride Of Christ
sermons.description: Brother David shares a powerful exhortation for the Headship of Jesus Christ and for the Church to seek to be a Bride for Christ. There is an end times purpose of God to see a assembled body of Christ that is a Bride to Him.  We need in the West the proper relationship with Christ to His Church.

sermons.title: How Satan Destroys a Church - Part 1 (GUARD YOUR GARDEN)
sermons.description: Satan seeks to destroy the church by attacking the Christian home.  He can wreak havoc in the church by destroying marriages and influencing the husband or wife to step out of their God ordained roles.  The basis of the home is marriage, the basis of marriage is a life long relationship, the basis of that is agreement.

sermons.title: How Satan Destroys a Church - Part 2 (HOW SATAN DESTROYS BY DIVIDING)
sermons.description: Satan seeks to destroy the church by dividing us from God and each other.  Rebellion against authority by anyone can bring destruction.  In the home the husband can lose his leadership by not loving his wife as instructed in Ephesians 5 and his wife will greatly suffer by his lack of love and the end result will be division in the home.

sermons.title: How to Make a Good Wife Better
sermons.description: Tom shares 8 responsibilities a husband has towards his wife from the Bible, using examples from his 22 years of married life to illustrate the principles.  There are many practical points, such as showing kindness, pleasing her, and expressing God's unconditional, unselfish and unending love.

sermons.title: New Life Baptist Church - Part 7
sermons.description: In this message, Paul deeply explores marriage and how God intends it as yet another method in conforming us to the image of His Son. He brings a freshness to this subject and the controversial debates that whirl around some Scriptures. A must for everyone who is married or anyone who has an inclination down that path.

sermons.title: On Being Filled with The Spirit
Spirit Filled Family
sermons.description: Is your home a little foretaste of heaven on earth?  That's what the Holy Spirit has come to do--to bring the atmosphere of heaven!  Have you ever considered that a Spirit-filled husband and a Spirit-filled wife is unique to New Testament times and what that means?  Are you seeking practical help from God's Word to mold and shape your family to be pleasing to your beloved Savior Jesus Christ?  Zac Poonen shares a wealth of practical insight on family life, such as submission, honor, hypocritical motives, tests for tension, and many more!  (85 min.)

sermons.title: Steps In The Path To Being Filled With The Holy Spirit
The Holy Spirit Gives Power
sermons.description: Billy Graham gives an opening statement at the Lausanne congress 1974 asking for prayer and introduces Corrie Ten Boom in the meeting. Corrie speaks on the need of the Holy Spirit Power in the Christian life. She speaks on how we can have God's boundless resources when we obey the happy commandment to be filled with the Spirit. The Spirit of God gives us the power to be witnesses for the great commission.

sermons.title: The Occult
sermons.description: Bill Mcleod covers the subject of the occult showing what things are hidden and beyond the bounds of normal human knowledge. Such occult is demonic and opposed to the counsel and spirit of God. We are to have no fellowship with the hidden things of darkness but rather reprove and uncover these things.

sermons.title: The Occult by Bill Mcleod
sermons.description: Bill Mcleod covers the subject of the occult showing what things are hidden and beyond the bounds of normal human knowledge. Such occult is demonic and opposed to the counsel and spirit of God. We are to have no fellowship with the hidden things of darkness but rather reprove and uncover these things.

sermons.title: The Revival Hymn
sermons.description: This is a very powerful audio message that will stir your spirit for revival! Clips of following speakers included in this message: Ian Paisley, Leonard Ravenhill, Paris Reidhead, Duncan Campbell, A.W. Tozer, T. Austin Sparks. This is probably one of the most potent and powerful audio recordings on this entire site. You will be changed as you listen to this compilation.

sermons.title: The Spirit Filled Life
sermons.description: 'The question is not,' Oswald J. Smith contends, 'Do I have the Holy Spirit?' but, 'Am I filled with the Holy Spirit?'  Smith shows how this commandment to be filled with the Spirit is essential to have power over sin and power for service.  HOW may I be filled?  Five conditions are laid out to consider: confession, renunciation, surrender, obedience and faith.  Mr. Smith closes with his own personal testimony of how God broke him in ministry and humbled him sorely so that he could be used in the power of the Spirit and not in the energy of the flesh.

sermons.title: The Spirit Filled Life by Oswald J. Smith
sermons.description: 'The question is not,' Oswald J. Smith contends, 'Do I have the Holy Spirit?' but, 'Am I filled with the Holy Spirit?' Smith shows how this commandment to be filled with the Spirit is essential to have power over sin and power for service. HOW may I be filled? Five conditions are laid out to consider: confession, renunciation, surrender, obedience and faith. Mr. Smith closes with his own personal testimony of how God broke him in ministry and humbled him sorely so that he could be used in the power of the Spirit and not in the energy of the flesh.

sermons.title: The Way To Spiritual Ascendancy 2
sermons.description: "Until the throne room is central to church life," Dana warns, "we're not gathering under an open heaven."  If we are going to represent the Lord Jesus Christ, we will encounter all kinds of opposition--counterfeit ministry, demonic opposition, interference in the prayer meetings, and so on.  To counteract the principalities and powers, we must know what it means to be filled with the Spirit.

sermons.title: Understanding Marriage - Reasons for a Wife's Submission
Understanding Marriage - Spiritual Preparation for Marriage
WITH ALL OUR HEART
sermons.description: God loves today.  We can only share His power and life when we also share His love.  This love He has revealed to us through the sacrifice of His Son and this love He gives to us that we might fulfill the true purpose of our life.  This meditation calls us to return to Him the love He so longs to receive from us.

sermons.title: WITH ALL OUR HEART!
sermons.description: God lives and works today! And He loves today. We can only share His power and life when we also share His love. This love He has revealed to us through the sacrifice of His Son and this love He gives to us that we might fulfill the true purpose of our life. Today's meditation, WITH ALL OUR HEART by Basilea Schlink, calls us to return to Him the love He so longs to receive from us.

sermons.title: YOU WILL NEVER BE ASHAMED
sermons.description: God is the same yesterday, today, and forever. That means we can count on Him. He will always fulfill His promises and He will never let His children down! But how can we become His children? The answer is in this meditation!
